meanings.definition: To make a smooth transition from one topic or section to another.
meanings.sent1: She segues from talking about her favorite book to discussing her favorite movie effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: He always segues from one song to the next without any awkward pauses.
meanings.sent3: The magician segues from pulling a rabbit out of a hat to making a coin disappear.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset seamlessly segue into the darkness of night.
meanings.sent5: The river segues gently from a narrow stream to a wide expanse.

meanings.definition: A smooth transition from one topic or section to another.
meanings.sent1: The speaker's segue from the introduction to the main topic was flawless.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a perfect segue from the action scene to the romantic subplot.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's unexpected segue from jokes about cats to jokes about dogs had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The segue between the two chapters felt like crossing a bridge between two worlds.
meanings.sent5: The segue between the seasons was marked by the changing colors of the leaves.
